  debounce: function(func, wait, immediate) {
    var timeout;
    return function() {
      var context = this, args = arguments;
      var later = function() {
        timeout = null;
        if (!immediate) func.apply(context, args);
      };
      var callNow = immediate && !timeout;
      clearTimeout(timeout);
      timeout = setTimeout(later, wait);
      if (callNow) func.apply(context, args);
    };
  }
};

window.HP = window.HUFFPOST;
window.HP.pageReady.cb = [];
window.HP.pageReady.identity = function(callback) {
  callback();
};

if (document.readyState !== 'loading') {
  window.HP.pageReady = window.HP.pageReady.identity;
  
} else {
  document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', function() {
    HP.pageReady.cb.forEach(HP.pageReady.identity);
    HP.pageReady = HP.pageReady.identity;

(function() {
  var match = window.location.hash.match(/initial-font-size=(\d+)/);
  if (match && match[1]) {
    var fontSize = parseInt(match[1], 10);
    var remBase = 16;
    if (!isNaN(fontSize)) {
      window.document.documentElement.style.fontSize = (fontSize / remBase) + 'rem';
    }

.pg-placeholder.active {
  padding: 20px 0;

<script type="text/javascript">
// NOTE: Wrong debug value is causing some issues with our ad debugger, so clearing it to fix the issue
(function flushDebugStorage(){
  try {
    var keyToRemove = 'debug';
    if (window.localStorage && localStorage.getItem(keyToRemove) !== null) {
      localStorage.removeItem(keyToRemove);
      return;
    }
  } catch (e) {
    console.log('error while flushing debug storage');
  }
})();
</script>
<script type="text/javascript">
  window.HPGam = window.HPGam || {};
  window.HPGam.cmd = window.HPGam.cmd || [];
  window.googletag = window.googletag || {};
  window.googletag.cmd = window.googletag.cmd || [];
  
  function getCookie(cookieName) {
    var cookies = document.cookie.split(';');
    for (var i = 0; i < cookies.length; i++) {
      var cookie = cookies[i].trim();
      if (cookie.startsWith(cookieName + '=')) {
        return cookie.substring(cookieName.length + 1);
      }
    }
    return null;
  }

  HPGam.cmd.push(function(){
    var brandPlatform = [];
    var renderer = 'unknown';
    var platform = '';

    var geo = '';
    var geoZoneMap = {
      "uk": "uk.huffpost"
    };

    var zoneOne = geoZoneMap[geo] || 'huffpost';
    brandPlatform.push(zoneOne);

    
    platform = 'desktop';
    brandPlatform.push('desktop');
    
    
    var category = 'unknown';
    
    category = 'media';
    
    

    
    renderer = 'cambria';
    
    
    
    

    var networkID = '6556';
    

    var testAdStr = "".replace(/\s*/g, '');
    var testAds = testAdStr.length > 0 ? testAdStr.split(",") : [];
    var affiliateCookie = getCookie('bf-affiliate');

    HPGam.env.setParams({
      abData: [],
      bnp: "",
      brandPlatform: brandPlatform.join('.'),
      entryId: "5bb59f8ce4b0ab0846865fd5",
      geo: geo,
      locale: 'en',
      networkID: networkID,
      pageTypes: ["bpage"],
      platform: platform,
      platformNames: ["cambria"],
      section: category,
      site: "us",
      subSections: ["media"],
      tags: ["cnn","cnn-ratings","jeff-zucker","jeff-zucker-cnn","media","video"],
      testAds: testAds,
      wCategory: [],
      wKeyword: [],
      wSentiment: [],
      authorNickname: "rebecca-shapiro",
      category: "media",
      affiliateCookie: affiliateCookie,
      cat: ""
    });

    function targetMap() {
      function csvToArr(str) {
        var str2 = str.replace(/(^\s+|\s+$)/g, '');
        return (str2.length && str2.split(",") || []);
      }
      var r = [];
      function addKV(key, val) {
        if (val.length > 0) {
          r.push([key, val]);
        }
      }
      addKV("destination", "huffpost");
      addKV("edition", "us");
      addKV("hpid", "5bb59f8ce4b0ab0846865fd5");
      
      
      
      addKV("zone3", 'media');
      
      
      addKV("section", csvToArr("media"));
      
      addKV("pageType", "B");
      addKV("cms_tag", csvToArr("cnn,cnn-ratings,jeff-zucker,jeff-zucker-cnn,media,video"));
      
      addKV("user", csvToArr("rebecca-shapiro"));
      var dfpKeywordVal = HPGam.getQuery("dfp-keyword");
      if (dfpKeywordVal) {
        addKV('dfp-keyword', dfpKeywordVal);
      }
      if (renderer) {
        addKV('renderer', renderer);
      }
      
 
      addKV('w_category',csvToArr(""));
      addKV('w_keyword',csvToArr(""));
      addKV('w_sentiment',csvToArr(""));
                               
      addKV("cat", "");
                               
      var affiliateCookie = getCookie('bf-affiliate');
      if (affiliateCookie) {
        addKV("affiliate", affiliateCookie);
      }
 
      return r;
    }

    googletag.cmd.push(function(){
      var map = targetMap();
      HPGam.log('setTargeting', map);
      map.forEach(function(t){
        return googletag.pubads().setTargeting(t[0], t[1]);
      });
    });

    return;
  });
</script>
<script async="" fetchpriority="high" src="https://modulous.huffpost.com/2025/09/10/1757516425-bundle-hp-gam-2be1eec.min.js" type="text/javascript"></script>
<script>
window.waitForGlobal = function(identifier, cb, poll) {
  var test = typeof identifier === "function" ? identifier : function() { return !!window[identifier]; };
  var interval;
  if(test()) {
    cb();
  } else {
    interval = setInterval(function(){
      if(test()) {
        cb();
        clearInterval(interval);
      }
    }, poll || 50);
  }
};

window.modulousQueue = (function() {
  var queue = [];
  var run = false;
  function runner(fn) {
    setTimeout(function(){
      try {
        fn();
      } catch (e) {
      }
    }, 0);
  }
  return {
     add: function(fn) {
       var _tmp1 = !run && queue.push(fn);
       var _tmp2 = run && runner(fn);
     },
     runAll: function() {
       var i = 0;
       run = true;
       for(;i<queue.length;i++) {
         runner(queue[i]);
       }
       queue = [];
     }
  };
}());

setTimeout(function(){
  waitForGlobal('jQuery', modulousQueue.runAll);
}, 5000);
</script><script id="server-experiment-data" type="application/json">{}</script></head><body class="entry standard media news us desktop" data-locale="en_US"><div id="fb-root"></div><div class="body-wrap"><a class="skip-to-content" href="#main" tabindex="0">Skip to Main Content</a><div class="js-react-hydrator" data-component-id="9672" data-component-name="Modal" data-component-props="{}"><div class="modal" id="modal" role="presentation"><div class="modal__inner"><button class="modal__close yr-no-track"></button><div class="modal__title"></div><div class="modal__subtitle"></div></div></div></div><script type="text/javascript">
waitForGlobal("adSetMOAT", function() {
  adSetMOAT("1");
});

class="big-banner__headline-container"><h2 class="big-banner__headline"><span class="big-banner__headline--first">Free Speech</span><span class="big-banner__headline--second">Under</span><span class="big-banner__headline--third">Attack</span></h2></div><div class="big-banner__text-container"><p class="big-banner__body"><span class="big-banner__sub-headline">Protect It With Us.</span>When critics are silenced, democracy suffers. A free press ensures truth reaches the people who need it most. Join us to stand against censorship now.</p><a class="js-entry-link big-banner__support-button support-button" data-vars-item-name="Support HuffPost" data-vars-item-type="text" 15.5268571,12.985525 Z" id="Fill-1"></path></g></g></g></svg></div></a><button class="social-buttons__icons__item social-buttons__icons__item--bookmark yr-track unbookmarked" data-entryid="5bb59f8ce4b0ab0846865fd5" data-vars-action-type="save" data-vars-action-value="bookmark" data-vars-item-name="bookmark" data-vars-item-type="button" data-vars-position-in-subunit="0" data-vars-subunit-name="share" data-vars-subunit-type="component" data-vars-type="web_content_action" data-vars-unit-name="left" data-vars-unit-type="sidebar"><div class="social-buttons__icons__item__svg-wrapper"><svg fill="none" height="24" viewbox="0 0 24 24" width="24"><g id="bookmark"><path d="M6 4.71834C6 4.25574 6.33414 4 6.60417 4H17.3958C17.6659 4 18 data-vars-item-name="facebook" data-vars-item-type="button" data-vars-position-in-subunit="2" data-vars-subunit-name="share" data-vars-subunit-type="component" data-vars-type="web_content_action" href="https://facebook.com/share.php?u=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.huffpost.com%2Fentry%2Fjeff-zucker-cnn-chief-network-hires-former-nbcuniversal-ceo_n_2211447%3Futm_campaign%3Dshare_facebook%26ncid%3Dengmodushpmg00000003" rel="noopener noreferrer" target="_blank"><div aria-hidden="true" class="social-buttons__icons__item__svg-wrapper"><svg class="social-icon_svg" fill="black" height="22" viewbox="5 5 22 22" width="22"><path clip-rule="evenodd" d="M27 16.0672C27 9.95496 22.0751 5 16 5C9.92486 5 5 9.95496 5 16.0672C5 21.5912 9.02254 26.1697 14.2813 27V19.2663H11.4883V16.0672H14.2813V13.629C14.2813 10.8553 15.9235 9.32313 18.4361 9.32313C19.6396 9.32313 20.8984 9.53929 20.8984 9.53929V12.2629H19.5114C18.1449 12.2629 17.7188 13.116 17.7188 13.9912V16.0672H20.7695L20.2818 19.2663H17.7188V27C22.9775 26.1697 27 21.5912 27 16.0672Z" fill-rule="evenodd"></path></svg></div></a><a aria-label="Email this article" class="social-buttons__icons__item social-buttons__icons__item--email js-share-link" data-vars-action-type="share" data-vars-action-value="email" data-vars-item-name="email" data-vars-item-type="button" data-vars-position-in-subunit="3" data-vars-subunit-name="share" data-vars-subunit-type="component" data-vars-type="web_content_action" data-vars-unit-name="left" data-vars-unit-type="sidebar" href="mailto:?subject=IT'S%20OFFICIAL&amp;body=Article%3A%20https%3A%2F%2Fwww.huffpost.com%2Fentry%2Fjeff-zucker-cnn-chief-network-hires-former-nbcuniversal-ceo_n_2211447%3Futm_campaign%3Dshare_email%26ncid%3Dother_email_o63gt2jcad4" rel="noopener noreferrer" target="_blank"><div aria-hidden="true" class="social-buttons__icons__item__svg-wrapper"><svg fill="none" height="24" viewbox="0 0 24 24" width="24"><g id="email"><path d="M3.50001 7.85715V7.85714C3.50001 7.09277 4.09666 6.5 4.80001 6.5H19.2C19.9034 6.5 20.5 7.09277 20.5 7.85714L20.5 8.65039L12.2123 12.5371C12.0778 12.6002 11.9222 12.6002 11.7877 12.5371L3.5 8.6504L3.50001 7.85715ZM12.6287 15.1713C14.5258 14.2937 16.4175 13.4022 18.3072 12.5116C19.0383 12.1671 19.7692 11.8226 20.5 11.4792V17.1429C20.5 17.9072 19.9034 18.5 19.2 18.5H4.80001C4.09666 18.5 3.50001 17.9072 3.50001 17.1429V11.4792C4.23079 11.8226 4.96165 12.167 5.69281 12.5116C7.58253 13.4021 9.47421 14.2936 11.3713 15.1712C11.7701 15.3557 12.2298 15.3558 12.6287 15.1713Z" fill="#626262" id="Union" stroke="#626262"></path></g></svg></div></a></div></div></div></div></aside><div class="entry__content-and-right-rail-container"><div class="entry__content-list-container js-cet-unit-buzz_body"><section class="entry__content-list js-main-content-list" id="entry-body"><span id="percent-trigger"></span><section class="entry__content-list js-entry-content js-cet-subunit"><div class="cli cli-embed js-no-inject"><div class="cli-embed__embed-wrapper"><script type="text/javascript">try{ var src_url="https://spshared.5min.com/Scripts/PlayerSeed.js?playList=517551569&height=411&width=570&sid=577&videoGroupID=147676&relatedNumOfResults=100&relatedMode=2&relatedBottomHeight=60&companionPos=&hasCompanion=false&autoStart=false&colorPallet=%23CC0000&vcdBgColor=%2323191919&shuffle=0&continuous=true"; src_url += "&onVideoDataLoaded=HPTrack.Vid.DL&onTimeUpdate=HPTrack.Vid.TC"; if (typeof(commercial_video) == "object") { src_url += "&siteSection="+commercial_video.site_and_category; if (commercial_video.package) { src_url += "&sponsorship="+commercial_video.package;  } } document.write('<scr' + 'ipt type="text/javascript" src="'+src_url+'"></scr' + 'ipt>');}catch(e){}</script></div></div><div class="primary-cli cli cli-text"><p>It's official.</p></div><div class="primary-cli cli cli-text"><p>Former NBC Universal chief Jeff Zucker <a class="js-entry-link cet-external-link" data-vars-item-name="will replace" data-vars-item-type="text" data-vars-position-in-subunit="0" data-vars-subunit-name="article_body" data-vars-subunit-type="component" data-vars-target-content-id="http://edition.cnn.com/2012/11/29/us/jeff-zucker-cnn-president/index.html" data-vars-target-content-type="url" data-vars-type="web_external_link" data-vars-unit-name="5bb59f8ce4b0ab0846865fd5" data-vars-unit-type="buzz_body" href="http://edition.cnn.com/2012/11/29/us/jeff-zucker-cnn-president/index.html" role="link" target="_hplink">will replace</a> <a href="https://www.huffpost.com/news/topic/cnn">CNN</a> Worldwide President Jim Walton, who is retiring at the end of 2012. The network announced Zucker's appointment on Thursday.</p></div><div class="primary-cli cli cli-text"><p>The Time Warner-owned cable news network suffered from record low ratings in 2012, hitting a 21-year primetime ratings low in the spring. The original 24-hour cable news network fell into a distant third place behind rival <a href="https://www.huffpost.com/news/topic/msnbc">MSNBC</a> and cable news leader <a href="https://www.huffpost.com/news/topic/fox-news">Fox News</a>. Walton announced his resignation over the summer, saying the network needed new leadership and "new thinking." </p></div><div class="cli cli-advertisement advertisement-holder"><div class="advertisement-sticky-wrapper"><div class="advertisement__label">Advertisement</div><div class="advertisement"><div class="ad-entry_paragraph_1 ad-spot--gam ad-spot--gam-inline-1" id="ad-inline-1"></div>
<script type="text/javascript">
  HPGam.cmd.push(function(){
		return HPGam.render("inline-1", "entry_paragraph_1", false, false);
  });
</script>
</div></div></div><div class="primary-cli cli cli-text"><p>For months, rumors swirled that Zucker was on Time Warner's short list to head the ailing cable news network. Zucker led NBC's "Today" show as executive producer from 1992-2000, turning the NBC News property into the number one program in morning television. He then rose to lead NBC Universal as president and CEO. </p></div><div class="primary-cli cli cli-text"><p>During his final years at NBC Universal, he was involved in the <a class="js-entry-link cet-internal-link" data-vars-item-name="highly-publicized controversy" data-vars-item-type="text" data-vars-position-in-subunit="1" data-vars-subunit-name="article_body" data-vars-subunit-type="component" data-vars-target-content-id="423278" data-vars-target-content-type="buzz" data-vars-type="web_internal_link" data-vars-unit-name="5bb59f8ce4b0ab0846865fd5" data-vars-unit-type="buzz_body" href="https://www.huffpost.com/entry/jeff-zucker-threatens-con_n_423278" role="link" target="_hplink">highly-publicized controversy</a> involving the network's late night programming and hosts Jay Leno and Conan O'Brien. Zucker left the network shortly after the late night controversy, when Comcast <a class="js-entry-link cet-internal-link" data-vars-item-name="acquired" data-vars-item-type="text" data-vars-position-in-subunit="2" data-vars-subunit-name="article_body" data-vars-subunit-type="component" data-vars-target-content-id="738004" data-vars-target-content-type="buzz" data-vars-type="web_internal_link" data-vars-unit-name="5bb59f8ce4b0ab0846865fd5" data-vars-unit-type="buzz_body" href="https://www.huffpost.com/entry/jeff-zucker-leaving-nbc_n_738004" role="link" target="_hplink">acquired</a> NBC Universal. </p></div><div class="primary-cli cli cli-text"><p>Earlier this week, Reuters <a class="js-entry-link cet-internal-link" data-vars-item-name="reported" data-vars-item-type="text" data-vars-position-in-subunit="3" data-vars-subunit-name="article_body" data-vars-subunit-type="component" data-vars-target-content-id="2201386" data-vars-target-content-type="buzz" data-vars-type="web_internal_link" data-vars-unit-name="5bb59f8ce4b0ab0846865fd5" data-vars-unit-type="buzz_body" href="https://www.huffpost.com/entry/jeff-zucker-cnn-nbc_n_2201386?utm_hp_ref=media" role="link" target="_hplink">reported</a> that CNN planned to name Zucker president of CNN Worldwide. When Time Warner CEO Jeff Bewkes <a class="js-entry-link cet-external-link" data-vars-item-name="appeared" data-vars-item-type="text" data-vars-position-in-subunit="4" data-vars-subunit-name="article_body" data-vars-subunit-type="component" data-vars-target-content-id="http://www.mediabistro.com/tvnewser/jeff-bewkes-has-no-comment-on-zucker-but-says-cnn-will-be-one-of-the-fastest-growing-networks_b156842" data-vars-target-content-type="url" data-vars-type="web_external_link" data-vars-unit-name="5bb59f8ce4b0ab0846865fd5" data-vars-unit-type="buzz_body" href="http://www.mediabistro.com/tvnewser/jeff-bewkes-has-no-comment-on-zucker-but-says-cnn-will-be-one-of-the-fastest-growing-networks_b156842" role="link" target="_hplink">appeared</a> at the Business Insider Ignition conference on Wednesday, he had no comment on the network's decision but said an announcement would come soon.</p></div><div class="cli cli-advertisement advertisement-holder"><div class="advertisement-sticky-wrapper"><div class="advertisement__label">Advertisement</div><div class="advertisement"><div class="ad-entry_paragraph_3 ad-spot--gam ad-spot--gam-inline-2" id="ad-inline-2"></div>
<script type="text/javascript">
  HPGam.cmd.push(function(){
		return HPGam.render("inline-2", "entry_paragraph_3", false, false);
  });
</script>
</div></div></div><div class="primary-cli cli cli-text"><p>On Thursday morning, CNN <a class="js-entry-link cet-external-link" data-vars-item-name="announced" data-vars-item-type="text" data-vars-position-in-subunit="5" data-vars-subunit-name="article_body" data-vars-subunit-type="component" data-vars-target-content-id="http://edition.cnn.com/2012/11/29/us/jeff-zucker-cnn-president/index.html" data-vars-target-content-type="url" data-vars-type="web_external_link" data-vars-unit-name="5bb59f8ce4b0ab0846865fd5" data-vars-unit-type="buzz_body" href="http://edition.cnn.com/2012/11/29/us/jeff-zucker-cnn-president/index.html" role="link" target="_hplink">announced</a> that Zucker will head the news network. In its announcement, CNN wrote that Zucker will "oversee 23 branded news and information businesses, including CNN's U.S. television network, CNN International, HLN and CNN Digital."</p></div><div class="primary-cli cli cli-text"><p>Zucker said he was thrilled to join CNN. "The global reach and scale of the CNN brand is unparalleled in all of news," he said. </p></div><div class="primary-cli cli cli-text"><p>In a <a class="js-entry-link cet-external-link" data-vars-item-name="memo sent to CNN staffers" data-vars-item-type="text" data-vars-position-in-subunit="6" data-vars-subunit-name="article_body" data-vars-subunit-type="component" data-vars-target-content-id="http://www.mediabistro.com/tvnewser/its-official-jeff-zucker-named-president-of-cnn-worldwide_b156897#more-156897" data-vars-target-content-type="url" data-vars-type="web_external_link" data-vars-unit-name="5bb59f8ce4b0ab0846865fd5" data-vars-unit-type="buzz_body" href="http://www.mediabistro.com/tvnewser/its-official-jeff-zucker-named-president-of-cnn-worldwide_b156897#more-156897" role="link" target="_hplink">memo sent to CNN staffers</a>, Turner Broadcasting Chairman Phil Kent wrote that Zucker will head the network from New York, not from its Atlanta headquarters where Walton was based. Zucker will begin in the end of January. </p></div><div class="cli cli-advertisement advertisement-holder"><div class="advertisement-sticky-wrapper"><div class="advertisement__label">Advertisement</div><div class="advertisement"><div class="ad-repeating_dynamic_display ad-spot--gam ad-spot--gam-inline-infinite" id="ad-inline-infinite"></div>
<script type="text/javascript">
  HPGam.cmd.push(function(){
		return HPGam.render("inline-infinite", "repeating_dynamic_display", false, false);
  });
</script>
</div></div></div><div class="primary-cli cli cli-text"><p>"We have both short-term and long-term challenges ahead, from strengthening our normal news day programming to navigating through the changing consumption patterns of news," Kent wrote to staffers. He later added, "In the meantime, I ask all of you to stay focused and please be a little patient; no one should expect overnight transformation."</p></div><div class="primary-cli cli cli-text"><p>Most recently, Zucker served as executive producer of former "Today" co-host Katie Couric's new syndicated daytime program, "Katie." Zucker will leave "Katie" mid-January before staring at CNN full time. Through a statement, Couric said, "I'm very excited that Jeff has such a wonderful opportunity at CNN and equally excited for CNN. I'm also grateful that Jeff has been so instrumental in getting our show off to such a strong start and look forward to working with the fantastic staff we've assembled and building on the strong foundation we've created."</p></div><div class="primary-cli cli cli-text"><p>When CNN hit a <a class="js-entry-link cet-internal-link" data-vars-item-name="20-year ratings low in total viewers" data-vars-item-type="text" data-vars-position-in-subunit="7" data-vars-subunit-name="article_body" data-vars-subunit-type="component" data-vars-target-content-id="1557504" data-vars-target-content-type="buzz" data-vars-type="web_internal_link" data-vars-unit-name="5bb59f8ce4b0ab0846865fd5" data-vars-unit-type="buzz_body" href="https://www.huffpost.com/entry/cnn-ratings-primetime-low-20-year_n_1557504?ref=cnn" role="link" target="_hplink">20-year ratings low in total viewers</a> in May, Kent <a class="js-entry-link cet-internal-link" data-vars-item-name="admitted" data-vars-item-type="text" data-vars-position-in-subunit="8" data-vars-subunit-name="article_body" data-vars-subunit-type="component" data-vars-target-content-id="1560621" data-vars-target-content-type="buzz" data-vars-type="web_internal_link" data-vars-unit-name="5bb59f8ce4b0ab0846865fd5" data-vars-unit-type="buzz_body" href="https://www.huffpost.com/entry/cnn-ratings-phil-kent-turner-ceo_n_1560621" role="link" target="_hplink">admitted</a> that he was "very unhappy" with the declining viewership and said that the network had "some other shows that probably need to be replaced."</p></div><div class="cli cli-advertisement advertisement-holder"><div class="advertisement-sticky-wrapper"><div class="advertisement__label">Advertisement</div><div class="advertisement"><div class="ad-repeating_dynamic_display ad-spot--gam ad-spot--gam-inline-infinite" id="ad-inline-infinite"></div>
<script type="text/javascript">
  HPGam.cmd.push(function(){
		return HPGam.render("inline-infinite", "repeating_dynamic_display", false, false);
  });
</script>
</div></div></div><div class="primary-cli cli cli-text"><p>While Fox News and MSNBC have experienced ratings successes from aligning news content with political viewpoints and commentary, some blame CNN's declining viewership on the network's decision to resist mixing news with opinion programming. </p></div><div class="primary-cli cli cli-text"><p>In August, the New York Post <a class="js-entry-link cet-internal-link" data-vars-item-name="reported" data-vars-item-type="text" data-vars-position-in-subunit="9" data-vars-subunit-name="article_body" data-vars-subunit-type="component" data-vars-target-content-id="1772192" data-vars-target-content-type="buzz" data-vars-type="web_internal_link" data-vars-unit-name="5bb59f8ce4b0ab0846865fd5" data-vars-unit-type="buzz_body" href="https://www.huffpost.com/entry/cnn-reality-shows-talk-shows-ratings_n_1772192" role="link" target="_hplink">reported</a> that CNN was considering the addition of reality programs into its lineup. The network <a class="js-entry-link cet-internal-link" data-vars-item-name="launched a weekend travel show" data-vars-item-type="text" data-vars-position-in-subunit="10" data-vars-subunit-name="article_body" data-vars-subunit-type="component" data-vars-target-content-id="2123891" data-vars-target-content-type="buzz" data-vars-type="web_internal_link" data-vars-unit-name="5bb59f8ce4b0ab0846865fd5" data-vars-unit-type="buzz_body" href="https://www.huffpost.com/entry/anthony-bourdain-cnn-parts-unknown_n_2123891" role="link" target="_hplink">launched a weekend travel show</a> with host Anthony Bourdain called "Parts Unknown" that will debut in Spring 2013. </p></div><div class="primary-cli cli cli-text"><p>On a phone call with press Thursday morning, Zucker said that Bourdain's upcoming program demonstrates an understanding "that the definition of news is broader than perhaps what has historically been talked about." </p></div><div class="cli cli-advertisement advertisement-holder"><div class="advertisement-sticky-wrapper"><div class="advertisement__label">Advertisement</div><div class="advertisement"><div class="ad-repeating_dynamic_display ad-spot--gam ad-spot--gam-inline-infinite" id="ad-inline-infinite"></div>
<script type="text/javascript">
  HPGam.cmd.push(function(){
		return HPGam.render("inline-infinite", "repeating_dynamic_display", false, false);
  });
</script>
</div></div></div><div class="primary-cli cli cli-text"><p>Zucker said he plans to "remain true to the journalistic values that have always been the hallmark of CNN, and continue to broaden the definition of what news is, and understand [the network's] competition is not just Fox [News] and MSNBC." He later added, "We live in a world where nonfiction programming comes in many forms ... News is not just about politics and war and I think that's something you'll see us think a lot about as well."</p></div><div class="primary-cli cli cli-text"><p>However, when asked if a goal is to get higher daily ratings than Fox News and MSNBC, Zucker paused for a moment before answering, "Yes." </p></div><div class="cli support-huffpost-mid-article primary-cli cli cli-text cli-support-huffpost hidden" id="support-huffpost-entry-support-huffpost-mid-article"><div class="cli-support-huffpost__content-wrapper"><div class="cli-support-huffpost__title default-title"><span class="cli-support-huffpost__title--first">20 Years Of</span><span class="cli-support-huffpost__title--second">Free</span><span class="cli-support-huffpost__title--third">Journalism</span></div><div class="contributor-once-variation"><div class="cli-support-huffpost__title"><span class="cli-support-huffpost__title--first">Your Support</span><span class="cli-support-huffpost__title--second">Fuels</span><span class="cli-support-huffpost__title--third">Our Mission</span></div></div><div class="contributor-canceled-variation"><div class="cli-support-huffpost__title"><span class="cli-support-huffpost__title--first">Your Support</span><span class="cli-support-huffpost__title--second">Fuels</span><span class="cli-support-huffpost__title--third">Our Mission</span></div></div><div class="cli-support-huffpost__container"><div class="cli-support-huffpost__message-container"><div class="cli-support-huffpost__message support-huffpost__message--main"><p>For two decades, HuffPost has been fearless, unflinching, and relentless in pursuit of the truth. Support our mission to keep us around for the next 20  we can't do this without you.</p><div class="cli-support-huffpost__sub-headline"></div></div><div class="cli-support-huffpost__message variation contributor-once-variation"><p>We remain committed to providing you with the unflinching, fact-based journalism everyone deserves.</p><p>Thank you again for your support along the way. Were truly grateful for readers like you! Your initial support helped get us here and bolstered our newsroom, which kept us strong during uncertain times. Now as we continue, we need your help more than ever. <a class="cli-support-huffpost__message__link js-entry-link" data-vars-item-name="we're offering an ad-free experience" data-vars-item-type="text" data-vars-position-in-subunit="12" data-vars-subunit-name="support-huffpost-mid-article" data-vars-subunit-type="component" data-vars-target-content-id="/support" data-vars-target-content-type="feed" data-vars-type="web_internal_link" data-vars-unit-name="main" data-vars-unit-type="buzz_body" href="https://www.huffpost.com/support">We hope you will join us once again</a>.</p></div><div class="cli-support-huffpost__message variation contributor-canceled-variation"><p>We remain committed to providing you with the unflinching, fact-based journalism everyone deserves.</p><p>Thank you again for your support along the way. Were truly grateful for readers like you! Your initial support helped get us here and bolstered our newsroom, which kept us strong during uncertain times. Now as we continue, we need your help more than ever. <a class="cli-support-huffpost__message__link js-entry-link" data-vars-item-name="we're offering an ad-free experience" data-vars-item-type="text" data-vars-position-in-subunit="12" data-vars-subunit-name="support-huffpost-mid-article" data-vars-subunit-type="component" data-vars-target-content-id="/support" data-vars-target-content-type="feed" data-vars-type="web_internal_link" data-vars-unit-name="main" data-vars-unit-type="buzz_body" href="https://www.huffpost.com/support">We hope you will join us once again</a>.</p></div></div><a class="cli-support-huffpost__support-button accent-button" data-vars-item-name="Support HuffPost" data-vars-item-name-overwritable="support-huffpost" data-vars-item-type="button" data-vars-position-in-subunit="11" data-vars-subunit-name="support-huffpost-mid-article" data-vars-subunit-type="component" data-vars-target-content-id="/support" data-vars-target-content-type="feed" data-vars-type="web_internal_link" data-vars-unit-name="main" data-vars-unit-type="buzz_body" href="https://www.huffpost.com/support?utm_campaign=mid-article-web">Support HuffPost</a><p class="support-huffpost-login">Already contributed? <a class="js-entry-link-no-impression" data-vars-item-name="Log in to hide these messages" data-vars-item-type="text" data-vars-subunit-name="support-huffpost-mid-article" data-vars-subunit-type="component" data-vars-target-content-id="/login" data-vars-target-content-type="utility" data-vars-type="web_internal_link" data-vars-unit-name="5bb59f8ce4b0ab0846865fd5" data-vars-unit-type="buzz_body" href="https://login.huffpost.com/login?dest=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.huffpost.com%2Fentry%2Fjeff-zucker-cnn-chief-network-hires-former-nbcuniversal-ceo_n_2211447%3Fhp_auth_done%3D1">Log in to hide these messages.</a></p></div></div></div><div class="primary-cli cli cli-text"><p>To address its ratings woes, Kent said CNN will seek to become "essential to a core fan base." Though CNN's primetime line up hit record lows in 2012, it's not the only day part suffering. When asked if CNN's morning programming will be a priority as the network steps into this next chapter, Kent said, "One of the great byproducts [of hiring Zucker] is he's an absolute expert in morning television ... It's not the reason [he was hired], but a wonderful byproduct."</p></div><div class="cli cli-advertisement advertisement-holder"><div class="advertisement-sticky-wrapper"><div class="advertisement__label">Advertisement</div><div class="advertisement"><div class="ad-repeating_dynamic_display ad-spot--gam ad-spot--gam-inline-infinite" id="ad-inline-infinite"></div>
<script type="text/javascript">
  HPGam.cmd.push(function(){
		return HPGam.render("inline-infinite", "repeating_dynamic_display", false, false);
  });
</script>
</div></div></div></section></section><section class="entry__extra js-extra-content-list" id="entry-extra"><section class="entry-footer" id="entry-footer"><div class="share-bar share-bar--footer <div class="outbrain-module">
<h2 class="taboola-title taboola__title outbrain-title">From Our Partner</h2>
<!-- Modulous: Outbrain -->
<div class="OUTBRAIN" data-src="" data-widget-id="SB_3"></div>
</div>

  window.comscore_data = {"c1":2,"c2":6723616,"options":{"url_append":"comscorekw=media","enableFirstPartyCookie":true,"bypassUserConsentRequirementFor1PCookie":false}};

  var script = document.createElement("script");
  script.src = "https://sb.scorecardresearch.com/cs/6723616/beacon.js";
  script.async = true;
  script.onload = function() {
    window.waitForGlobal("COMSCORE", function() {
      window.waitForGlobalCambria('__uspapi', function() {
        window.__uspapi('getUSPData', 1, function(uspData, uspSuccess) {
          if (window.comscore_data.cs_ucfr === 0) {
            return; // already opted out
          } else if (!uspSuccess) {
            window.comscore_data.cs_ucfr = 1; // set consent since that is default CCPA
          } else if (uspData.uspString && uspData.uspString[2] === 'Y') {
            window.comscore_data.cs_ucfr = 0; // opted out
          } else {
            window.comscore_data.cs_ucfr = 1; // given consent
          }
        });
      }, 50, { fallback: 1000 });
      window.COMSCORE.beacon(window.comscore_data);
      console.debug('firing comscore:', window.comscore_data);
    });
  };
  document.body.appendChild(script);
</script><noscript><img alt="" height="1" src="https://sb.scorecardresearch.com/p?c1=2&amp;c2=6723616&amp;c3=&amp;c4=&amp;c5=&amp;c6=&amp;c15=&amp;cj=1" width="1"/></noscript><div class="advertisement ad-mobileweb-bottom-floating"></div><script>
window.addEventListener('load', function() {
  var ref = document.getElementsByTagName("script")[0];
  var script = document.createElement("script");
  script.src = 'https://s.skimresources.com/js/38395X1559799.skimlinks.js';
  script.async = true;
  ref.parentNode.insertBefore(script, ref);
}, false);
</script><script>
for (iframe of document.getElementsByTagName('iframe')) {
  source = iframe.getAttribute('src');
    if(source && source.match(/^(http|https):\/\/vid.me/)) {
      console.log(`removing ${source}`)
      iframe.remove();
    }
}
</script>
<script type="text/javascript">
(function(){
		if (!!(window._modulous_disabled && window._modulous_disabled('publicgood')) || (window.HP && window.HP.params && window.HP.params.features && window.HP.params.features.adsFree)) { 

        return; 
    }
    waitForGlobal(function(){
        var cambriaNodes = document.querySelectorAll(".js-main-content-list div.cli");
        var legacyKrakenNodes = document.querySelectorAll(".js-entry-text div.content-list-component");
        return !!(document.body && (cambriaNodes.length || legacyKrakenNodes.length));
    }, function() {
        var nodes = document.querySelectorAll(".js-main-content-list div.cli");
        if (!nodes.length) {
            // Just trying legacy kraken nodes
            nodes = document.querySelectorAll(".js-entry-text div.content-list-component");
        }
        if (!nodes.length) {
            console.log('[PG]: no nodes found');
            return;
        }

        var showCallback = function() {
            console.log('[PG]: Callback on article');
            document.getElementById('public-good-placeholder').className = 'pg-placeholder advertisement active advertisement-holder loaded';
        };
        var hideCallback = function() {
            console.log('[PG]: no campaign match');
        };
        
        var placeholder = document.createElement('div');
        placeholder.className = "pg-placeholder";
        placeholder.setAttribute('id', 'public-good-placeholder');
        var position = "mid";
        var targetDiv;
        if ( position === 'mid' ) {
        targetDiv = nodes[5];
        } else if ( position === 'bottom' ) {
        targetDiv = nodes[nodes.length - 1];
        }
        if ( !targetDiv || !targetDiv.parentNode ) {
        console.log('[PG]: could not find CLI at position \'mid\'');
        } else {
        targetDiv.parentNode.insertBefore(placeholder, targetDiv.nextSibling);
        var pgmOptions = {
            partnerId: "verizon-huffpost",
            onShow: function() {
            console.log('[PG]: show callback fired');
            showCallback();
            },
            onHide: function() {
            console.log('[PG]: hide callback fired');
            hideCallback();
            }
        };
        var script = document.createElement('script');
        script.async = true;
        script.onload = function() {
            pgmApi.create(document.getElementById("public-good-placeholder"), pgmOptions);
        };
        script.src = "https://assets.publicgood.com/pgm/v1/pgm-api.js";
        console.log('[PG]: loading PG scripts, position ' + position);
        document.head.appendChild(script);
        }
    });
})();
</script>
<script>window.addEventListener('load', window.modulousQueue.runAll);</script>
<!-- Modulous: Outbrain -->
<script type="text/javascript">
        (function(){
        try {
          var permalink = (window.location.protocol + "//" + window.location.hostname + window.location.pathname);
          var allOutbrains = document.querySelectorAll('.OUTBRAIN');
          for (var w in allOutbrains){
            var __tmpOb = allOutbrains[w].setAttribute && allOutbrains[w].setAttribute('data-src', permalink);
          }
        } catch(e) {
             var divsToHide = document.getElementsByClassName("outbrain-module");
          for(var i = 0; i < divsToHide.length; i++){
              divsToHide[i].style.visibility = "hidden";
          }
                console.error(e); 
            }
      }());
    </script>
<!-- Loads via abOutbrainTest in cambria -->
<!-- END Modulous: Outbrain -->
</main></div></body></html>
